reviewText: On this DVD, he explains what an income statement is and how to read it in detail. He does a great job of explaining line by line what the different parts of an income statement are and why it is important that you understand how to read it. This DVD also gives you a lot of detailed information that an average investor often does not know.

This video teaches you how to read the income statement. First, he talks about income statement in general - what it is and how it is structured. Then, he goes into detail discussing individual items listed on the income statement. He shows you all of this on the computer screen. Also, I really liked how he explained how the income statement relates to the balance sheet.
